data.name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
data.description: A talisman depicting three iron arrows. Carried by soldiers long ago.
data.effect: Raises attack power of arrows and bolts

data.name: Arsenal Charm
data.description: An iron charm that resembles a mass of weaponry. Boosts maximum equipment load. This talisman was derived from an unusual greatsword, once wielded by a hero hungry for vengeance.

data.name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
data.description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in cerulean. Critical hits restore FP.

data.name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
data.description: An assassin's dagger, misshapen and stained in crimson. Critical hits restore HP.

data.name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
data.description: A talisman depicting three arrows. Carried by hunters of beasts.

data.name: Axe Talisman
data.description: A talisman depicting an axe and a warrior. Enhances charge attacks.

data.name: Boltdrake Talisman
data.description: Talisman depicting a yellow ancient dragon. Boosts lightning damage negation.

data.name: Blue Dancer Charm
data.description: A cloth doll depicting a dancer garbed in blue. An ancient heirloom of some sort.
data.effect: Raises attack power with lower equipment load

data.name: Blessed Dew Talisman
data.description: Talisman depicting a drop of the Erdtree's sap, a blessed boon.

data.name: Bull-goat's Talisman
data.description: A talisman depicting the horns of a bull-goat. Raises poise.
